solution_line_template: The area of the largest room is {largest_room_width} ft x {largest_room_length} ft = <<{largest_room_width}*{largest_room_length}={area_largest_room}>>{area_largest_room} sq ft
The area of the smallest room is {smallest_room_width} ft x {smallest_room_length} ft = <<{smallest_room_width}*{smallest_room_length}={area_smallest_room}>>{area_smallest_room} sq ft
The difference between the two is {area_largest_room} sq ft - {area_smallest_room} sq ft = <<{area_largest_room}-{area_smallest_room}={difference_in_area}>>{difference_in_area} sq ft
